daily_wisdom.arabic: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
daily_wisdom.transliteration: Kul yâ ibâdiyellezîne esrefû alâ enfusihim lâ taknetû min rahmetillâh

meaning.tr: De ki: Ey nefislerine karşı aşırı giden kullarım! Allah'ın rahmetinden ümit kesmeyin.
meaning.en: Say: O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of Allah's mercy.
meaning.fi: Sano: Oi palvelijani, jotka olette ylittäneet itseänne vastaan, älkää epätoivoko Allahin armosta.

practicalTip.tr: Her düşüş bir ders. Tetikleyicini not et, farkındalığın gücü artırır.
practicalTip.en: Every fall is a lesson. Note your triggers, awareness builds strength.
practicalTip.fi: Jokainen kaatuminen on opetus. Huomioi laukaisijasi, tietoisuus rakentaa voimaa.

daily_wisdom.arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
daily_wisdom.transliteration: Ve men yetevekkel alallâhi fehuve hasbuh

meaning.tr: Kim Allah'a tevekkül ederse, O ona yeter.
meaning.en: And whoever puts their trust in Allah, He will be enough for them.
meaning.fi: Ja joka luottaa Allahiin, Hän riittää hänelle.

practicalTip.tr: Zor anlarında abdest al. Su hem bedeni hem ruhu temizler.
practicalTip.en: Take wudu in difficult moments. Water purifies both body and soul.
practicalTip.fi: Ota wudu vaikeina hetkinä. Vesi puhdistaa sekä kehon että sielun.

daily_wisdom.dhikr: Lâ havle velâ kuvvete illâ billâh

daily_wisdom.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ التَّوَّابِينَ وَيُحِبُّ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
daily_wisdom.transliteration: İnnallâhe yuhibbut tevvâbîne ve yuhibbul mutetahhirîn

meaning.tr: Şüphesiz Allah çokça tövbe edenleri sever, çokça temizlenenleri de sever.
meaning.en: Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant and loves those who purify themselves.
meaning.fi: Totisesti Allah rakastaa niitä, jotka katuvat jatkuvasti ja rakastaa niitä, jotka puhdistavat itsensä.

practicalTip.tr: Günde 5 vakit namaz, rutin oluşturur. Rutin güçlüdür.
practicalTip.en: 5 daily prayers create routine. Routine is strength.
practicalTip.fi: 5 päivittäistä rukousta luovat rutiinin. Rutiini on voimaa.

meaning.tr: Allah sizin tövbenizi kabul etmek istiyor.
meaning.en: And Allah wants to accept your repentance.

practicalTip.tr: Telefonunu uzağa koy gece. Mesafe koruma sağlar.
practicalTip.en: Put your phone away at night. Distance provides protection.
practicalTip.fi: Laita puhelimesi pois yöksi. Etäisyys tarjoaa suojaa.

meaning.tr: Muhakkak ki zorlukla beraber kolaylık vardır.

practicalTip.tr: Bu an geçecek. Derin nefes al, 10'a kadar say.
practicalTip.en: This moment will pass. Breathe deeply, count to 10.
practicalTip.fi: Tämä hetki menee ohi. Hengitä syvään, laske kymmeneen.

meaning.en: Allah will replace their evil deeds with good.
meaning.fi: Allah korvaa heidän pahat tekonsa hyvillä.

practicalTip.tr: Her kötü düşüncenin yerine bir zikir koy.
practicalTip.en: Replace every bad thought with a dhikr.

daily_wisdom.arabic: وَأَنَا أَغْفِرُ لِمَن تَابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا
daily_wisdom.transliteration: Ve ene eğfiru limen tâbe ve âmene ve amile sâlihan

meaning.tr: Tövbe eden, iman eden ve salih amel işleyeni muhakkak bağışlarım.
meaning.en: And indeed, I am Forgiving of whoever repents, believes and does righteous deeds.
meaning.fi: Ja totisesti, minä annan anteeksi sille, joka katuu, uskoo ja tekee hyviä tekoja.

practicalTip.tr: Bugün bir iyilik yap. Sadaka, günahları örter.
practicalTip.en: Do a good deed today. Charity covers sins.
practicalTip.fi: Tee hyvä teko tänään. Hyväntekeväisyys peittää synnit.

daily_wisdom.arabic: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنفُسَنَا وَإِن لَّمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
daily_wisdom.transliteration: Rabbenâ zalemnâ enfusenâ ve in lem tağfir lenâ ve terhamnâ lenekunenne minel hâsirîn

meaning.tr: Rabbimiz! Biz kendimize zulmettik. Eğer bizi bağışlamaz ve bize merhamet etmezsen, mutlaka hüsrana uğrayanlardan oluruz.
meaning.en: Our Lord! We have wronged ourselves. If You do not forgive us and have mercy on us, we will surely be among the losers.
meaning.fi: Herramme! Olemme vääristäneet itseämme. Jos et anna meille anteeksi ja armahda meitä, olemme varmasti häviäjien joukossa.

practicalTip.tr: Hz. Adem'in duası. Samimiyetle oku, kabul edilir.
practicalTip.en: The dua of Prophet Adam. Recite sincerely, it will be accepted.
practicalTip.fi: Profeetta Adamin dua. Lausu vilpittömästi, se hyväksytään.

emergency_dhikr.arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
emergency_dhikr.transliteration: Lâ havle velâ kuvvete illâ billâh

meaning.en: There is no power and no strength except with Allah.
meaning.fi: Ei ole voimaa eikä voimakkuutta paitsi Allahilta.

tawbah_dua.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيَّ الْقَيُّومَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
tawbah_dua.transliteration: Estağfirullâhel azîm ellezî lâ ilâhe illâ hû el hayyel kayyûme ve etûbu ileyh

meaning.tr: Kendisinden başka ilah olmayan, diri ve her şeyi ayakta tutan yüce Allah'tan bağışlanma diler ve O'na tövbe ederim.
meaning.en: I seek forgiveness from Allah the Almighty, there is no god but Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining, and I repent to Him.
meaning.fi: Pyydän anteeksiantoa Allahilta, Kaikkivaltiaalta, jota paitsi ei ole jumalaa, Ikuisesti Elävältä, Itsekannattavalta, ja kadun Hänelle.

protection_duas.arabic: رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
protection_duas.transliteration: Rabbi eûzu bike min hemezâtiş şeyâtîn ve eûzu bike rabbi en yahdurun

meaning.tr: Rabbim! Şeytanların vesveselerinden sana sığınırım. Onların yanımda bulunmalarından da sana sığınırım Rabbim!
meaning.en: My Lord! I seek refuge in You from the whispers of the devils. And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, from their presence.
meaning.fi: Herrani! Turvaudun Sinuun paholaisten kuiskauksista. Ja turvaudun Sinuun, Herrani, heidän läsnäolostaan.

meaning.en: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.

en: Splash cold water on your face
Open the Quran, read a few verses
